column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The service started off slow
column2: however our server apologized several times and made up for it. Everything we ordered was phenomenal! Started off with large
column3: thick slices of warm sourdough bread. We shared the fries with garlic aioli
column4: the short rib stroganoff and the spicy fried chicken. Be sure to make reservations though! It was packed on a Sunday night.
